sentence.Network_en: His walk was lithe and graceful.
The leopard is sleek, long and lithe.

sentence.Network_en: He stretched his lean, lithe body.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English līthe 'gentle, meek' also 'mellow', of Germanic origin; related to German lind 'soft, gentle'

entry.tran: 身体柔软的；动作轻巧自如的
entry.def: A lithe person is able to move and bend their body easily and gracefully.

example.tran: 身体柔软的年轻体操运动员

example.ex: His walk was lithe and graceful.

means.word_mean: 1. gracefully slender; moving and bending with ease
